Authors: Soebandrija K.E.N., Costan, Baity R.D., Congronegoro C.
Title: Business excellence and ICT as enabler: Sustainable supplier evaluation using super decision software and analytic network process (ANP)
Source title: International Journal of Applied Engineering Research
Affiliations: Bina Nusantara University, Industrial Engineering Department, Kampus Syahdan, Jl. K.H. Syahdan No. 9, Palmerah, Jakarta Barat, 11480, Indonesia

Syahdan No. 9, Palmerah, Jakarta Barat, 11480, Indonesia; Congronegoro, C., Bina Nusantara University, Industrial Engineering Department, Kampus Syahdan, Jl. K.H. Syahdan No. 9, Palmerah, Jakarta Barat, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: Nowadays, in highly competitive industry, company utilizes in full swing, the available and cutting edge strategies enabling to compete with other companies that eventually lead to sustainability. Precisely, the Sustainable Supplier Selection is indispensable for company in both sustainable supply chain and sustainable company. This paper comprises a balance among the Conceptual, Theoretical and Managerial implications (CTM) and Empirical Study (ESY), that is known as Case Study (CSY). CTM in this paper constitutes the literature reviews. Those literature reviews are pertaining Supplier Selection (SPS), Supplier Evaluation (SPE), Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP) and Analytic Network Process (ANP) of Saaty ((1980, 1990, 1995,1996, 2000, 2001, 2004, 2005 and 2008), and eventually related methods not to mention the need from company for Multiple Criteria Decision Making. ESY in this paper constitutes the empirical study in PT. Alfa Global Indah (PT. AGI) using a software, namely, Super Decision, as elaborated by Saaty (2004). © Research India Publications.
Author Keywords: Analytic Network Process (ANP); Business excellence; ICT as enabler; SuperDecision software; Supplier
